Diary of Lydia:
I do not know why I'm here! It seems he knows all my most secret secrets! He asked me what I did not want to leave. I was careful with him, but I can not remember what I said. All that was... I lost it! Make that really happen? He asks that I have given all of myself to this! He accused me of betraying my family, my life, my god, and even the natural law! "I do not know what you mean!"
